description.narrative: Social protection and population policies/strategies and legislation developed and/or amended to reflect the needs of the most vulnerable population, which contributes to Social Protection, Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020 relevant government institutions are strengthened to monitor child rights, reduce poverty and provide inclusive access to social protection services, including for the most marginalized children, especially Roma children and girls and boys with disabilities

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Social protection and population policies/strategies and legislation developed and/or amended to reflect the needs of the most vulnerable population

description.narrative: Following UNICEF advocacy, the new Law on Financial Support to Families with Children was adopted by the Federal House of Representatives of the Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina, while it still has to be approved by the Federal House of Peoples after a public consultation process. Two policy papers on social inclusion were developed with UNICEF support, prioritizing child and youth-specific issues and providing recommendations for specific institutional, legal and policy improvements to be included in the forthcoming Social Inclusion strategic frameworks in line with EU standards. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:19/01/2020

title.narrative: Existence of analysis of the disability assessment procedures in FBiH and social protection by-laws in FBiH and RS

baseline.value: Lack of assessment analysis and by-laws

target.value: 2020:2 social protection by-laws developed by end 2020

actual.value: 2019:Analysis of the disability assessment procedures in the FBiH completed and validated by end of 2019. Findings and reccommendations of the analysis have been translated into a Road map for system change.

title.narrative: Existence of rapid assessment of the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic for Social Protection in selected cantons

target.value: 2020:Rapid assessment of impact of COVID-19 pandemic to Social Protection in selected cantons conducted

title.narrative: Cash transfers: Existence of legislation on cash transfer programmes and/or family benefits

baseline.value: The Law on financial support of families with children in Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina drafted

target.value: 2020:FBiH Law on support to families with children adopted

actual.value: 2019:Draft Law on Financial Support to Families with Children is in the approval process, pending the review and approval by the House of Peoples.
